channel.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
channel.description: Just an idea for an Evil Prince. Same aspects as the Prince but with the difference of being able to execute the BD and not the unseen/cult. Allowing the Unseen/Cult members to apply defilement to whomever the Prince has jailed that night to make himself not seem suspicious to the rest of the BD. Not adding a Convertible aspect to the prince, but given the same % chance of an Evil Prince spawning as an Evil King without making every Evil King game an Evil Prince game

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
That’s fair

Give a prince a different objective and somehow they do the greatest thing ever

Read full topic

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
Firelitten:

You sure?

Wouldn’t it be fun to have a person who can execute 3 RANDOM BD WITH NO FEAR

Seeing how dumb some Prince’s are i wouldn’t be surprised to see them execute all Unseen.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
The evil prince or the bastard suggestion?

Read full topic

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Pretty much what I was going to say. The game is already too damn swingy because of the starting King’s faction alignment. Adding an Evil Prince would make it downright impossible for BD to win if both King and Prince were Evils. The Prince needs nerfs, but to add an a chance that they’ll start out as Evil makes RNG too influential and binary in matches.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
An evil Prince would be way too swingy. Assuming the same odds as King, there would be a 1/3 chance the BD would be down a Prince, and also get an extra enemy.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
Now that’s dumb as fuck.

Read full topic

Maybe only the unseen can learn if the prince is evil?

item.title: [New Class] Evil Prince
item.dc:creator: Cinnamon
item.description:
He’d have to be unable to be investigated, otherwise he’s just easily done for.
‘Hey guys, this is the Prince.’
HEY PRINCE IS UNSEEN/CULT.
Can’t be Scorned play, I mean I guess you could call it Fool play but what Fool claims Prince.
A lot of people want Evil Prince, myself included. Lmao

Read full topic

item.description:
Would work but maybe make it so the prince jas this passive outsider same benefits as the good prince but wont know who his teammates are
